title: High Elo Logic
body:
All these boosted animals are ruining my plat/diamond games! I better go smurf and boost some silvers and ruin Silver and Gold games!

Any of these people ever think that if they played in there own elo they would eventually knock down these boosted accounts, regaining some of the ranked integrity all without ruining the other half of the
Ladder? 

PSA if you smurf and do anything but solo queue with it you are causing the problems you are complaining about.

Not bashing on all high elo who complain but as soon as you smurf and play with a silver friend you become the problem not the solution.

>
> Saying that there's a lot of complaining about people being in the wrong divisions. Both boosted people in high elo and smurfs in low elo.

If the ranking system took into account individual skill metrics in addition to W/L ratio this wouldn't be an issue. It's impossible to rank individuals on a ladder according to their individual skill without ever once using their individual skill metrics as part of that ranking...

If the system did this it'd be impossible for boosted players to remain boosted and impossible for smurfs to play for long in low Elo.

> [{quoted}](name=jaymc1130,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=oO3tH7wV,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-09-09T19:35:22.280+0000)
>

> 
> If the system did this it'd be impossible for boosted players to remain boosted and impossible for smurfs to play for long in low Elo.

I agree. Game should just rank you on your MMR or your average MMR over the past X games. But they want a grind system in place hence the need for lp. I don't even play more than 10 or so ranked games a season since it's frustrating having to beat gold 1 opponents to get myself promoted to silver 2.
I smurf for lower Qtimes. oh well.
I'm not for 1 account in ranked per person, but I hate it when people intentionally smurf in bronze 5.
